name: The DeskTop. Beta
description:
The DeskTop. Is about a monitor and a desktop, Sounds stupid right? well your right!

With this game you can play on a desktop, ON A DESKTOP! with crappy none copyrighted names as, Noogle, Youpipe, Neatflix, Shindows 9, Mist, any more! But my game is only on 0.1.0 I first started to work on it on gamejolt, So I am using both now. You can download it here or download it over on gamejolt
